response.summary: Industrial Engineer and Statistics Methods Specialist formed in Universidad Nacional de Colombia; with experience and knowledge in significant data volumes and agile strategies generation looking the product improvement. Interested in organizational resources optimization, especially in Digital Marketing, Product Management, Data Science, and Finance. Great data and text comprehension and analysis, furthermore a math-logic reasoning aptitude.  Strategic thinker, leadership, teamwork, and result in orientation capability. Good skills with Office suite, management reports, and presentations.
response.skills: Digital Channels, Digital Campaigns, Campaigns, SAS (Software), Pricing Analysis, Analytics, Financial Reporting, Business Analytics, Agile Methodologies, Data Analytics, Finance, Marketing digital, Google Ads, Planificación estratégica, SQL, Análisis de datos, Microsoft Excel, Análisis financiero, Google Adwords, Microsoft PowerPoint

profile_positions.description:
Initiative owner for the propensity customer churn model project, where were did the business case, were defined the core milestones for the product framework. The project has been developed and tracked under the Scrum and Kanban methodologies.

Define strategies with the team and stakeholders inside the bank, finding behavior patterns, identifying trends and impacts through metrics and big data analysis to improve payments and financial portfolio KPIs, to contribute to the growth and market share goal established by the bank.

Generate, process, analyze, and report every single metric of the Banco de Bogota’s Unidad de Retencion, working with SAS, Power BI and advanced excel.
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Specific and general sales data , market share, segments, channels, fill rate and principal Avianca Holding routes fares analysis. Having the focus in the Colombia, Argentina, Chile, Uruguay, Paraguay and Bolivia’s markets. Besides, are made dashboards and reports to the area director and managers to their display, among others leaded to the sales force.

Strategy and tactics generation to improve the sales KPI’s, from the WTC (Weekly Tracking Committee) leadership, in which participate every area of the Sales, Marketing and Revenue vice-presidency, with the final purpose of increase the revenue per sales region.
profile_positions.title: Channels and Segments Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Data extraction and analysis from the web analytics tool, aiming the dashboards, and reports generation to such internal as external clients. These reports facilitate the decision making, such as tactic, strategical to the product, and the organization. Financial models making, demand and offer forecasts, business unity accomplishment capacity calculation.

The digital marketing strategy creation, execution, measurement, and optimization (Google ads, Facebook, DSP, etc.), improving the costs, the CPA (Cost per acquisition), and the business unit EBITDA. Part of this strategy was the metrics plan.

Participation in the first phase of the new program of revenue management implementation, which was made a complete evaluation of the information quality and the first diagnosis to begin the pricing and fill rate optimization, aiming the revenue increase.
profile_positions.title: Digital Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Marking, productivity, and absenteeism of the Colombian, Latin American, and United States Avianca Holding employees project development, where was made the current process information pickup and analysis, also were made periodic reports of the project advance. Besides was proposed a new system that allows the overtime standardization and registration, aiming to a good joint with the payroll system and a cost decrease.

Support in the Human Resources Operational Service Center development and implementation. I oversaw the operational and transactional process of the Talent attraction area to Avianca Holding (Colombia, Peru, Ecuador, Salvador, Costa Rica)
profile_positions.title: Trainee

company.name: Banco de Bogotá
company.description:
El Banco de Bogotá cuenta con una amplia capacidad de gestión y ofrecemos altos niveles de atención y servicio, con soluciones tecnológicas adecuadas a las necesidades de nuestros clientes, gracias al esfuerzo y profesionalismo de un equipo talentoso, intuitivo y comprometido con el crecimiento del país. 

En el Banco de Bogotá evolucionamos hacia nuevas formas y mejores de hacer las cosas. Somos un Banco en pro del crecimiento profesional de nuestros colaboradore(a)s. Creemos en el progreso de nuestros clientes, equipo humano, accionistas y de Colombia. Fomentamos una cultura de trabajo de compromiso, eficiencia, honestidad y respeto. Desde hace 150 años tenemos un compromiso con Colombia, basado en nuestra historia, experiencia y solidez.

Haz parte del grupo de talentosos trabajadores que con dedicación, agilidad, eficiencia, compromiso y lealtad creamos productos y servicios para todos, y estamos motivados de pertenecer al Banco de Bogotá.
